subject: Shifter knob extension?
description_text:
Hello,

I was interested in buying your H gear shifter but wanted to know if you
know of any shifter knob extensions that are compatible with your device?
Or what are the measurements I need to attach an extender?

Thank you,
Simon Chung

[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Simon,    Our shifter uses a M10 thread, so you can choose a compatible extender or gear knob based on this specification.

Okay, thank you for letting me know! I went ahead and bought the shifter
and a hand brake.

Simon
